review: He treated my daughter with correct guidance, thanks to him. It was just at a single visit he diagnosed and gave solution
Very understanding doctor.  Explained likey reasons for pain and specified reasons for further tests to give a detailed analysis

Hi Doctor,. Just wanted to reconfirm this with you. I was charged 15% service charge on consultation and 15% service charge on XRay. I wasn't comfortable with the explanation provided. So the bill which was supposed be 1100 was 1265 because of the additional 15%.
********* *******  We have waited for just 10 minutes for patient history formalities. Excellent staff with an excellent co-ordination.

Dr. Madan Mohan Reddy, is one real orthopedic surgeon, and really understands the patients need. 
And of course doctor is upto date.
Doctor kindly attended me and took different positions of painful area and gave medicine and advice for me. In quick time Good experience .

review: our experience with Dr madan mohan reddy was amazing. He is an excellent doctor and a wonderful human being. it rare to find such good heart people these days. he has great expertise in his work and looks into the matter very carefully. i would definitely recommend every patient to visit him. the staff was also very cooperative and friendly. overall we are very satisfied with the visit.

He did the treatment in a complete different manner my father is suffering from bilateral knee problem he forcefully told us that have a BMC injection and he will get cure for next 6 to 8 years *** ****** * ***** *** **** ********** He asked around 1.5 lakh INR for the treatment
He is an excellent doctor ...he is very friendly and quickly diagnose the problem and give appropriate treatment...we have 12 long years association with the doctor....
Treatment was good .. excellent about ambiences. Staffs are helpful. pleasant music was played with good nature
Good ambiences ..staffs were helpful with the patients. Treatment given by the doctor was sastisfied.
